EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners / {{lead.Full Name:default=}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=future associate}},
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going?
Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before:
- There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one:
http://www.mbopartners.com/resources/presentations <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources/presentations>
- MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, thereâ€™s real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/index.html> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
{{lead.EM FName:default=Sara}} ___________________________________ {{lead.EM FName:default=Sara}} {{lead.EM LName:default=Conde}} Consultant Services Advisor
MBO Partners
t: {{lead.EM Phone:default=703-793-6028}} f: 703-793-6070 e: {{lead.EM Email:default=sconde@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
